usageExamples: dotnet new evtsrc -uri event-demo --consumer-group main-consumer -n MyCompany.Events -eb MyEvent
dotnet new evtsrc -uri event-demo -s3 --aws-profile AUTH_PROFILE --s3-bucket event-sourcing-demo --consumer-group main-consumer -n MyCompany.Events -eb MyEvent
dotnet new evtsrc --no-producer -uri event-demo --consumer-group main-consumer -n MyCompany.Events -eb MyEvent
dotnet new evtsrc --no-consumer -uri event-demo --consumer-group main-consumer -n MyCompany.Events -eb MyEvent
